Please see https://www.notion.so/fluencenetwork/Release-workflow-af0e5992d65b49aa8e13db4cc809d46b

Please enable renovate for this repository @folex

Please change repository settings before merging this PR:
- automatically delete branch after merge

title: feat(keypair): add KeyPair::from_secret_key
body:
chore: update libp2p-core to 0.36

chore: update libsecp256k1 to 0.7.1

title: fix bug get_all_certs_from, update example
body: tetraplets for timestamp were checked incorrectly

title: ci: remove circle, update gh, add lints; remove warnings
Add memory leak temporary mitigation
body: Add a temporary workaround for the problem mentioned in https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-libc/issues/298

title: High-level Aqua API
body:
- add high-level TG API
- add export.aqua to npm package
- rework example with multiple nodes

title: Fix revocations logic
body:
Previously revocation works only in a direct way, just revoke the previous trust A -> B. 
Now it revokes all chains which contain a path from A to B, for example, A -> C -> D -> B
Also changed `Revoke` structure naming to plural `Revocation`

title: Update READMEs, example, fix bug in aqua api
body:
- [x] update root README
- [x] update example
- [x] update example/README

title: Refactor service_api.rs
body:
- add wrappers
- remove service_impl.rs
- make service_api.rs more readable and meaningful

title: Trust Graph: implement WASM built-in
body:
- Closes #16
- Closes #11 
- build WASM TrustGraph service with peer ids API
- add js example how to use TG: sign trusts/revocations, get certificates
- set up CI
- build TG as a builtin package (like aqua-ipfs or aqua-dht)

title: Remove serde version lock
body: It was locked on `serde = "=1.0.118"`, I've relaxed it to `serde = "1.0.118"`
